column2: "Don't mind me. I was simply observing your battle technique."
"It seems that you still haven't completely honed your senses, but your overall ability is still fairly high."
"For someone like you to be in ARKS is somewhat encouraging..."
"Forgive me, I neglected to mention that I'm also a member of ARKS."
"I'm an ally, so you don't have to look so defensive."
"I have the information I require. Excuse me."
